src:
Another 13-Year Confinement
01 Nov 2019, 19:21 by BRIEF
LOS ANGELES – A man who was civilly confined in a state hospital for over 13 years claims the Los Angeles Public County Defender mishandled his case so badly it amounts to deliberate indifference – nearly identical to a recently settled lawsuit.
